title: Notwithstanding anything contained in the Development Control Regulations of Planning Authorities, no amenity space is required to be left for development of IT / ITES / Data Center buildings
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in the Development Control Regulations of Planning Authorities, no amenity space is required to be left for development of IT / ITES / Data Center buildings.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Notwithstanding anything contained in the Development Control Regulations of Planning Authorities, no amenity space is required to be left for development of IT / ITES / Data Center buildings.
